title: Remove Basic and Premium pricing plans from dashboard

requirements.summary: Remove the PricingTable component from the CommandCenter dashboard page that displays the Basic plan ($299/month) and Premium plan ($499/month)
acceptanceCriteria: The pricing table with Basic and Premium plans is no longer visible on the dashboard
The dashboard layout adjusts appropriately without the pricing table section
No pricing plan information appears in the CommandCenter view

file_operations.description: Remove the PricingTable component import and its usage from the CommandCenter page. Remove the corresponding grid section that contains the PricingTable while preserving all other dashboard components (KPI metrics row, security traffic trends, active identities card, and control panel). Adjust the grid layout to ensure proper spacing and alignment of remaining components.
